item.title: Volunteer with Sidewalk Warriors | July 3
item.description: Take time to give back during your summer break! Join the CCPD and engage with the local community as we volunteer with Sidewalk Warriors on Thursday, July 3rd from 4:30-8pm. Register and learn more in Handshake and reach out to Dean Burke, burked5@rpi.edu, with questions.

item.title: Standing on the Shoulders of Heroes Pride Exhibit | June 16-July 13
item.description: Date: Monday, June 16, 2025 - Sun , July 13, 2025 (all day) - In celebration of Pride Month, the LGBTQ+ Task Force presents an exhibit celebrating heroes who have stood tall in the face of injustice. Please visit these posters on the main floor of Folsom Library. Each one shares the story of people who have risked much to speak for others. Exhibit courtesy of Stonewall National Museum and Archives and thanks to the generosity of Jason Hagopian ’91, ’92, the Rensselaer Alumni Association and the…

item.title: Systems Engineering & Technology Management Graduate Degree Review with Rensselaer at Work | July 2
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 2, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - This 30-minute information session is hosted by Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., and will focus on Rensselaer’s Systems Engineering and Technology Management graduate degree. item.title: Office Relocation Notice – Parking and Transportation Department
item.description:

Our hours of operation and contact information remain the same. Phone number : 518-276-8528 or 518-276-6616 and email: parking@rpi.edu.
